TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit MembershipCreateUserException extends System.Exception

summary.span: 当成员资格提供程序未能成功创建用户时引发的异常。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when a user is not successfully created by a membership provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实例时，将引发类操作失败。An instance of the class is thrown when a operation fails. > [!NOTE] > 如果你不熟悉 ASP.NET 成员资格功能，请参阅[简介成员资格](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/79184d17-f4c7-4c9f-a073-cec4f5543980)才能继续。If you are not familiar with the membership features of ASP.NET, see [Introduction to Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/79184d17-f4c7-4c9f-a073-cec4f5543980) before continuing. 与成员资格相关的其他主题的列表，请参阅[使用成员资格管理用户](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd)。For a list of other topics related to membership, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd). 属性指示异常的原因，以便可以正确地处理它。The property indicates the reason for the exception so you can handle it appropriately. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个新 ASP.NET 应用程序配置为使用 forms 身份验证和 ASP.NET 成员资格用户。The following code example creates a new user for an ASP.NET application configured to use forms authentication and ASP.NET membership. 如果用户未成功创建，代码将捕获并显示在指定的消息属性。If the user is not created successfully, the code catches the and displays the message specified in the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁的文本框。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 类引发的方法时未创建该用户。The class is thrown by the method when the user is not created. 你可以使用`message`参数设置到的异常的原因有意义的描述异常的属性。You can use the `message` parameter to set the property of the exception to a meaningful description of the reason for the exception. ## Examples 下面的代码示例调用方法来创建新的成员资格用户。The following code example calls the method to create a new membership user. 如果用户创建失败，根据消息将引发返回方法。If the user creation fails, a is thrown with a message based on the returned by the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数在反序列化过程中调用，以便重建通过流传输的异常对象。This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream. 有关详细信息，请参阅[XML 和 SOAP 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md)。For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现调用受保护的构造函数使用提供的序列化信息和上下文的基类的类。The following code example shows an implementation of the class that calls the protected constructor of the base class with the supplied serialization information and context. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使您能够确定为什么抛出，并相应地做出响应。The property enables you to determine why the was thrown and respond accordingly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个新 ASP.NET 应用程序配置为使用 forms 身份验证和 ASP.NET 成员资格用户。The following code example creates a new user for an ASP.NET application configured to use forms authentication and ASP.NET membership. 如果用户未成功创建，代码将捕获并显示在指定的消息属性。If the user is not created successfully, the code catches the and displays the message specified in the property.
